--- named_schemas_alter_sequence.sql
ALTER SEQUENCE sch1.sequence
    SET OPTIONS (skip_range_min=1, skip_range_max=1234567)
--- AST
&ast.AlterSequence{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 15,
        NameEnd: 19,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 20,
        NameEnd: 28,
        Name:    "sequence",
      },
    },
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 37,
    Rparen:  86,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 46,
          NameEnd: 60,
          Name:    "skip_range_min",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 61,
          ValueEnd: 62,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 64,
          NameEnd: 78,
          Name:    "skip_range_max",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 79,
          ValueEnd: 86,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1234567",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  RestartCounterWith: (*ast.RestartCounterWith)(nil),
  SkipRange:          (*ast.SkipRange)(nil),
  NoSkipRange:        (*ast.NoSkipRange)(nil),
}

--- SQL
ALTER SEQUENCE sch1.sequence SET OPTIONS (skip_range_min = 1, skip_range_max = 1234567)
